com.skobbler.ngx.navigation

Class SKNavigationSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.navigation.SKNavigationSettings

  • public final class SKNavigationSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    SKNavigationSettings defines settings for turn by turn navigation. ( See SKNavigationManager.startNavigation(SKNavigationSettings) ). All the properties have default values. When an instance of SKNavigationSettings is allocated, its already populated with those default values.
    Version:
    2.5

      • getSpeedWarningThresholdInCity

        public double getSpeedWarningThresholdInCity()
        Returns the threshold for speed warning callback inside cities in m/s. If the current speed is greater than current speed limit + speedWarningThresholdInCity , the SKNavigationListener.onSpeedExceededWithAudioFiles(String[], boolean) or SKNavigationListener.onSpeedExceededWithInstruction(String, boolean) is called (depeding on the audio advisor set).
        Returns:
        Returns the threshold for speed warning callback inside cities

      • setSpeedWarningThresholdInCity

        public void setSpeedWarningThresholdInCity(double speedWarningThresholdInCity)
        Sets the threshold for speed warning callback inside cities in m/s. If the current speed is greater than current speed limit + speedWarningThresholdInCity , the SKNavigationListener.onSpeedExceededWithAudioFiles(String[], boolean) or SKNavigationListener.onSpeedExceededWithInstruction(String, boolean) is called (depeding on the audio advisor set).
        Parameters:
        speedWarningThresholdInCity - new speedWarningThresholdInCity to be set

      • getSpeedWarningThresholdOutsideCity

        public double getSpeedWarningThresholdOutsideCity()
        Returns the threshold for speed warning callback outside cities in m/s. If the current speed is greater than current speed limit + speedWarningThresholdOutsideCity , the SKNavigationListener.onSpeedExceededWithAudioFiles(String[], boolean) or SKNavigationListener.onSpeedExceededWithInstruction(String, boolean) is called (depending on the audio advisor set).
        Returns:
        Returns the threshold for speed warning callback outside cities

      • setSpeedWarningThresholdOutsideCity

        public void setSpeedWarningThresholdOutsideCity(double speedWarningThresholdOutsideCity)
        Sets the threshold for speed warning callback outside cities in m/s. If the current speed is greater than current speed limit + speedWarningThresholdOutsideCity , the SKNavigationListener.onSpeedExceededWithAudioFiles(String[], boolean) or SKNavigationListener.onSpeedExceededWithInstruction(String, boolean) is called (depending on the audio advisor set).
        Parameters:
        speedWarningThresholdOutsideCity - new speedWarningThresholdOutsideCity to be set

      • getPositionerVerticalAlignment

        public float getPositionerVerticalAlignment()
        Return the positioner vertical aligment. Value should be in [ -0.5, 0.5 ].
        Returns:
        the positioner vertical aligment

      • setPositionerVerticalAlignment

        public void setPositionerVerticalAlignment(float positionerVerticalAlignment)
        Set the positioner vertical alignment. Set this property for changing the position of the ccp(current car position) on the vertical axes. The value of this property is a percent which indicates the distance between the cpp and the bottom of the screen in points divided with the height of the screen. The value of this property should be in [ -0.5, 0.5 ].
        Parameters:
        positionerVerticalAlignment -

      • getPositionerHorizontalAlignment

        public float getPositionerHorizontalAlignment()
        Return the positioner horizontal aligment. Value should be in [ -0.5, 0.5 ].
        Returns:
        the positioner vertical aligment

      • setPositionerHorizontalAlignment

        public void setPositionerHorizontalAlignment(float positionerHorizontalAlignment)
        Set the positioner horizontal alignment. Set this property for changing the position of the ccp(current car position) on the vertical axes. The value of this property is a percent which indicates the distance between the cpp and the bottom of the screen in points divided with the height of the screen. The value of this property should be in [ -0.5, 0.5 ].
        Parameters:
        positionerHorizontalAlignment -
